data.question: What is the empirical formula of NU-603?
What is the crystal system of NU-604?
At what temperature were the NU-600 crystals synthesized?
What is the yield based on the H4TCPB-Br2 linker for NU-605 crystals?
What method was used for the water sorption measurements?
Can NU-605 retain its maximum water uptakes for three cyclic measurements?
data.answer: Yes, NU-605 retained its maximum water uptakes for the three cyclic measurements.

data.question: Is the linker installation strategy effective in improving the hydrolytic stability of MOF structures?
data.answer: Yes, using linker installation is an effective strategy toward improved hydrolytic stability of MOF structures.

data.question: What is the space group of NU-603?
What was the final R index for NU-604 with all data?
What was the purpose of using a solvent squeezing method in the crystallographic analysis?
data.answer: The solvent squeezing method was used to mask electron density within the pores due to the inability to accurately determine the crystallographic locations of the solvent molecules.

data.question: Did the installation of auxiliary linkers significantly change the unit cell of the NU-600 framework?
data.answer: No, the installation of auxiliary linkers into the NU-600 framework did not significantly change the unit cell due to the rigidity of the primitive NU-600 framework.

data.question: Was the water working capacity of NU-605 consistent across 17 cycles of pressure swing experiments?
data.answer: Yes, the water working capacity of NU-605 was consistent across 17 cycles of pressure swing experiments.

data.question: What was the highest water uptake at 90% RH among the MOFs listed in Table S2?
What was the crystal size of NU-603?
Did the PXRD patterns of NU-604-(OH)2 and NU-605-(OH)4 confirm their structural stability after water sorption?
data.answer: Yes, the PXRD patterns confirmed that the structures of NU-604-(OH)2 and NU-605-(OH)4 were retained after water sorption.

data.question: What was the yield of NU-603 crystals based on the H4TCPB-Br2 linker?
What was the formula weight of NU-604?
What was the space group of NU-605?
What was the volume of the unit cell for NU-603?
Did the SEM images show that all four MOF particles have cubic morphology?
data.answer: Yes, the SEM images showed that all four MOF particles have cubic morphology.
